content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin

Protein synthesis is vital for cell growth and metabolism.
content.question: Describe structural changes that can occur to a protein after translation to make it function properly.

frqParts.text: Describe structural changes that can occur to a protein after translation to make it function properly.
